title: Under the Feet of Jesus - Estrella's character

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Viramontes uses literary elements and techniques to develop Estrella’s complex character.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Viramontes uses literary elements and techniques to develop Estrella’s complex character.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
